author: admin
title: Cloudian, Inc. to Exhibit at IBC2015, Booth 2.C11
text:
About Cloudian, Inc. 
Cloudian makes it easy to deploy full-featured, on-premises, Amazon-style private clouds. Simply use Cloudian HyperStore® software, or the fully integrated HyperStore® appliance to ensure nearly unlimited capacity expansion, straightforward data tiering, and unfettered use of the vast ecosystem of AWS S3 applications – all behind your firewall. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150910006476/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
